column2: hit this place when I lived in Chicago several times but have been living on west coast the last 15 years. Came back to visit and craved some tapas and came here. Oh my
column3: it was as good as I remember. Iberico pork
column7: paella and a tray of 4 desserts. Phenomenal! Â Love it and friends who tried it for first time agreed. Good times and loved being back in Lincoln Park.
